invalidFlag.boolean: Flag **${flag}** doesn't get a value, it's just `--${flag}`!
invalidFlag.string: Flag **${flag}** requires a value, append it with `=`! (Example: `--${flag}=potatoes`)

global.nan: The input you specified is not a number.
global.notText: Channel **${channel}** is not a text channel.
global.hierarchy: User is above or the same as you in hierarchy.
global.unableToPunish: I was unable to punish the user.
global.unableToFind: I was unable to find user.
global.notInBanList: User is not banned in this guild.
global.unable: I was unable to do this. `${error}`
global.missingAccess: I am missing access in the channel you linked.

errors.title: Unable to run command ${command}!
errors.guildOnly: Sorry, but command `${command}` needs to be ran in a guild!
errors.ownerOnly: Sorry, but command `${command}` is developer-only, nice try.
errors.disabled: Sorry, but command `${command}` is disabled globally.

permissions.user: Sorry, but you are missing the following permissions: ${perms}.
permissions.bot: Sorry, but I am missing the following permissions: ${perms}.

unknown: The error that occured has been logged into our systems.
If this is repeative, report it to ${owners} at ${server}.

automod.badwords: Please don't swear in this server, ${member}.
automod.invite: Please don't advertise on this server, ${member}.
automod.mentions: Please don't mention more then 4 users, ${member}.

embed.title: ${username} | Commands List
embed.footer: Use ${prefix}help <command> to get more documentation of a command!
description: More information is avaliable on the [website](${website})!

invite.title: Invite Me
description: > **Invite me to your server today o-or join my owner's Discord to get updates and such...**

embed.title: ${username} | Localization
description: Use `${prefix}locale list` for a list of locales to set
Use `${prefix}locale set [locale] [--guild]` to set a guild's or your locale
Use `${prefix}locale reset [--guild]` to reset it back to English

set.none: No locale has been selected, use `${prefix}locale list` to view a list of locales.
set.invalid: Locale ${locale} is not a locale, use `${prefix}locale list` to view a list of locales.
set.unable:guild: I was unable to set the guild's locale
set.unable:user: I was unable to set your locale

reset.unable:guild: I was unable to reset the guild's locale.
reset.success:guild: I have resetted the guild's locale to en_US.
reset.unable:user: I was unable to reset your locale.
reset.success:user: I have resetted your locale to en_US.

settings.invalidSubcommand: Subcommand **${subcommand}** is not a valid subcommand. (${subcommands})
settings.noChannel: No channel ID, mention, or name were specified.

add.amountRequired: Amount of warnings to chain a punishment is required, make it a number between 1 and 5.
add.invalidPunishment: Punishment **${punishment}** is not a valid punishment to add. (${punishments})
add.missingRoleID: You are currently missing a role ID.
add.invalidDays: Incorrect amount of days. The `days` flag is the amount of days of messages to delete when banning.
add.errored: I was unable to set the punishment, please try again later.
add.amountExceeded: Punishments are limited to 15 per server, please remove any punishment you don't want.
add.success: I have added the punishment to the database.
add.invalidTime: The `--time` flag must be a currect time expression, it can be from 0.5h, 30m, 0.5 hours, or 30 minutes.
add.invalidRole: The role wasn't found or it was invalid

remove.invalidIndex: The index you provided was not a valid index. You can view the punishment index by `x!settings view`.
remove.noPunishments: No punishments were found in the database.

modlog.unable: I was unable to set channel **${channel}** as the mod log.
modlog.success: Channel **${channel}** is now where all mod logs will be at.
modlog.noPerms: I don't have `Send Messages` or `Embed Links` permission in **${channel}**

prefix.none: You need to provide a prefix to set.
prefix.atEveryone: You are not allowed to use at everyone/here as a prefix, also you angered your members.
prefix.over20: The prefix went over the 20 character limit by ${chars}.
prefix.unable: I was unable to set the prefix to **${prefix}**, try again later.
prefix.success: Prefix **${prefix}** is now the guild prefix. Test it with `${prefix}ping`.

mutedRole.none: You need to provide a role ID.
mutedRole.noneFound: Role by id **${id}** was not found.
mutedRole.unable: I was unable to set the muted role to **${role}**, try again later.

badwords.none: You need to provide a list of words to blacklist! You can add mutiple with a space, example: `x!settings set automod.badwords bitch fuck`.

added.notEnabled: I have added **${words}** words to the blacklist. Since you didn't have it enabled, I have enabled it for you.
added.enabled: I have added **${words}** new words to the blacklist.

ignored.none: You must provide a list of channel ID, mention, or names. You can add mutpile with a space, example: `x!settings set logging.ignore #abc abcd 92827492`
ignored.invalid: These channels are invalid to ignore: ${channels}

added.notEnabled: I have added **${channels}** channels to the list, since you didn't enable the Logging feature, I enabled it for you.
added.enabled: I have added **${channels}** new channels to the list.
